content.rendered:
Vmaxinfo Instituteis the best training institute for WordPress course in Pune. If you are looking for professional training in WordPress you can join at Vmaxinfo Institute, Pune. WordPress CMS (Content Management System) is easy way to create blog or website without knowledge of any coding.

WordPress is the most popular CMS for blogging and creating website. WordPress is easy to learn if get training in proper institute. Vmaxinfo Instituteis the best training institute to learn WordPress course in classroom and online. WordPress course can be attained by any professional, graduate, college or school students.

WordPress course duration is about one month with lot of practice session and exercises. WordPress course content are as below

  • Install WordPress
  • Create Blog and Pages
  • Adding Media to Blog and Pages
  • Menu and its types
  • Installing and activating theme
  • Installing Plugin
  • Work with different theme
  • Create Template
  • Theme customization
  • Working with Forms
  • Work with WordPress API
  • Create Professional Website
  • Ecommerce Website
  • Accept Payment with payment Gateway

After completion of course you can able to design your own website using CMS, create ecommerce website with payment gateway, create professional website.

WordPress Course in Pune

If you want to join WordPress course at professional level contact Vmaxinfo Instituteat following branches.

College Road, Pune

09, Sumangal Luxuria, 3rd Floor,
Beside Westside Mall, Yeolekar Mala,
College Road, Pune-422005

Contact No. 0253-2582186, 7030314949

Ashok Stambh, Pune

1, Basement, Anant Chambers,
Behind Dholya Ganapati Mandir,
Ashok Stambh, Pune-422001
Ph.:02536649111,9096871111
